subject: fix(pwa): update manifest text and icons from John Doe to Jaco Theron
body:
PWA install prompt and icons still showed placeholder "John Doe" / "JD"
from the initial scaffold. Updated manifest name, short_name, and
description to match the actual CV owner. Regenerated all icon assets
(pwa-192x192, pwa-512x512, apple-touch-icon, favicon.ico, mask-icon.svg)
with "JT" initials.

Tags: pwa, icons, branding, bugfix
Complexity: 1
Urgency: 2
Impact: user-facing
Risk: low
Debt: paid
Epic: pwa-branding
Semver: patch
